datatype.name: employee
datatype.desc: Used to hold employee information in firms

datatype.name: vacancy
datatype.desc: Used by households to hold vacancy information

datatype.name: job_application
datatype.desc: Used by firms to hold job applications

datatype.name: job_offer
datatype.desc: Used by households and firms to hold job offers

datatype.name: consumption_goods_offer
datatype.desc: Used by household and mall to hold consumption goods offers

datatype.name: consumption_request
datatype.desc: Used by mall to hold demand

datatype.name: mall_info
datatype.desc: Used by firm to hold information about sales in malls

datatype.name: mall_quality_price_info
datatype.desc: Used by household to hold information about quality and prices of one good offered by mall

datatype.name: mall_stock
datatype.desc: Used by mall to hold information about current stock

datatype.name: delivery_volume_per_mall
datatype.desc: Used by firm to hold information about delivery volume per mall

datatype.name: logit_firm_id
datatype.desc: Used by household to stock logits and corresponding firm IDs

datatype.name: sales_in_mall
datatype.desc: Used by mall to calculate sales

datatype.name: ordered_quantity
datatype.desc: Used by household to stock ordered quantities

datatype.name: received_quantities
datatype.desc: Used by household to stock received quantities

datatype.name: sold_quantities_per_mall
datatype.desc: Used by firm to hold informations about sales

datatype.name: sales_statistics
datatype.desc: Used by firm to store sales in malls of last periods

datatype.name: household_data
datatype.desc: Used by Market Research to store data of the different regions

datatype.name: firm_data
datatype.desc: Used by Market Research to store data of the different regions

message.name: tax_payment
message.note: Added by firm to pay taxes

message.name: interest_payment
message.note: Added by firm to pay interest on debt

message.name: debt_installment_payment
message.note: Added by firm to pay debt installments

message.name: dividend_payment
message.note: Added by firm to pay dividends

message.name: loan_request
message.note: Added by firm to demand credit

message.name: loan_conditions
message.note: Added by bank to offer credit

message.name: loan_acceptance
message.note: Added by firm to demand credit
